content: **crocheted dress with raglan lace pattern and short sleeves worked top down sizes s - xxxl the piece is worked in drops safran ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no e-270 yarn group a ----------------------------------------------------------- sizes s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl materials drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 700-750-800-900-1000-1050 g colour 05 light blue purple the piece can also be crocheted with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group a see link below drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm or the size needed to get 22 treble crochets and 12 row on 10 cm in width and 10 cm in height drops crochet hook size 3 mm for short sleeves ----------------------------------------------------------
